text: Ah, welcome Mr. Trump! So you are going to be running for office? Lets hope you can make the right decisions at the right time. After all, that is what being President is all about.

choices.text: Wait what, I'm running for President?

text: Please note that the journey might contain shocking imagery. All choices in the game solely exist for comedic reasons and not with the intention to hurt anybody. Do you understand Mr. President?
